headline: Kari Lake Rips Karrin Robson For Family's Stadium Having Trans-Restrooms
author: Garret Lewis
sentences: Don't forget Kari will be at the Beer Club For Men this Thursday, March 24, from 4p-7p at the courtyard at St. Phillip's Plaza (River/Campbell).
Kari Lake called out Karrin Robson for having her family's hockey arena allowing men to use women's bathrooms.
